title: Cap Streamer, 1701–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Binche ground
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description:
Binche-style lace design composed of symmetric pattern of foliated and floral forms, set within medallions of varying shapes, connected by serpentine garlands outlining medallions. 
Modes: maille a cinq trous, fond de neige, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamer, 1701–50.
1701–50. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Binche ground. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-50.
